mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks for military tract from him and Mr. Tone; recognizes there will be a conflict between Great Britian and U.S.; delay gives U.S. strength; outcome cannot be predicted; has lived through three wars; hopes he may be discharged before a fourth.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tone, William Theobald Wolfe, 1791-1828
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1819 June 30, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to William Sampson, n.p.
